name: Stoch
description:
Stoch is a mix bettween platformer and bullet hell shooter. Many bullets will come on your way while you go through the side-scrolling platform. Use the spells to guide you towards victory. There are also boss fights where one single enemy can spawn bullets enough to drain your health out.

Instructions to play the game are in-game.

This game isn't bug-free. Press zero (0) key on your keyboard if you find yourself stuck on a wall.
